channel.title: Posts on The Antenna Guy
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Antenna Guy

item.title: UHF RFID Antennas - I - The basics
item.description: This is the first official entry to the blog! {:refdef: style=“text-align: center;”} {: refdef} So the other day I was watching this video and I thought “Hey I can actually do that!” (Design UHF RFID antenna tags). So I decided the first entries to this blog would be dedicated to UHF RFID antennas (I don’t even feel qualified to qualify that idea…). I always found RFID technology very interesting. It’s a shame that it is really obscured, especially the UHF.
